text: Interestingly, I didn't have to clear out IDs
I altered them slightly to avoid any overlap issues, but it worked fine, and with dependant field groups
idk if it’s required, I was told by a non HS dev that you clear out the id’s otherwise it can conflict with the id’s of other module’s fields
never seen the conflict actually happen, but I do know if you clear the id field it will generate new id’s automatically
There needs to be documentation on working with these files in FTP
hmmm... I will try that with fields without dependancies
yeah... not to mention documentation for the custom-widgets API
yeah, seeing as FTP is apparently just a facade of that API it could perhaps be the same documentation even
